name: obsolete: Flight Rising: highlight Fiona familiars
description:
turned obsolete by the hoard revamp

highlights familiars used for Fiona's feats in pink :)

user.name: minecraft girlfriend
user.about:
hi im actually nonbinary but minecraft girlfriend sounded like a decent alias thats also totally unlike my regular usernames so im stealth and wont get banned for flight rising crimes
also yea i only created an account bc i needed to highlight fiona fams and went ahead and made a style for that! be the change u wanna see in the world

additional_info: feel free to rip it and use it however you'd like :) red hib den highlight from that other style shows thru updates (new to old) october 22, 2020: hoard revamp! this script is redundant now, so i won't be updating it anymore! september 19, 2020: 2 new fams added! august 18, 2020: 12 new fams added! june 19, 2020: 8 new fams added! may 08, 2020: 8 new fams added! plus all past fams now have annotations by bluecam (thank you!!), and i'll annotate all future updates as well! april 09, 2020: 8 new fams added! march 03, 2020: 8 new fams added!
